data.title: IOAN CLOTEA on LinkedIn: Land investment opportunity ! Discover the immense potential and explore…

Land investment opportunity !
 Discover the immense potential and explore the vast opportunities that this land offers, including its strategic location…
data.text:
Hello everyone! We want to express our sincerest gratitude to the Association of Peruvians in Australia for their recent visit and our productive meeting. It was a pleasure to share our business plan with you and explore the exciting commercial opportunities between Peru and Australia. We are excited about the potential for collaboration in several key areas: 1. Chancay to Shanghai Port: A new route that will reduce shipping times from 25 days to just 10 days, facilitating #trade and improving logistical efficiency. 2. Airport Infrastructure Improvement: The modernization of Lima Airport Partners and Northern Airports will open up new possibilities for both tourism and cargo transport. 3. Peru Mining: Peru has vast mineral reserves and a competitive exportable offer that represents solid investment opportunities and a robust portfolio of Public-Private Partnership projects. We appreciate your commitment and are confident that, by working together, we can build a prosperous future for both countries. We look forward to continuing our close collaboration and achieving great success! Happy Independence Day 28 July! #TradeAndInvestment #PeruAustraliaPartnership #DiscoverPeru #TourismOpportunities #InvestInPeru #PeruAustraliaTrade #ExplorePeru #BusinessOpportunities #TradeConnections #TourismAndTrade #PeruEconomicGrowth #AustraliaMeetsPeru Eduardo Ferrero Mauricio Panizo Sol Campos De Parry Luis Cuadros 👉Download our 2023 🇦🇺🇵🇪bilateral economic relationship Peru- Australia 📲 https://lnkd.in/ebD4DguC

The journey around the world to our 54 joint ventures and long-term partnerships continues. Over to #America! Let's visit #Mexico! Mexico is a federal republic in #CentralAmerica framed by the #Pacific Ocean, the Gulf of Mexico and the #Caribbean Sea. The capital of the country is Mexico City. Neighboring countries are the #US to the north and #Guatemala and #Belize to the southeast. Mexico is the most populous Spanish-speaking country in the world and has about 129 million inhabitants. The country is highly #biodiverse, encompasses diverse climatic conditions, and is home to a variety of animals and plants. It has a long history dating back to the #Aztec Empire, of which World Heritage sites such as Chichén Itzá can still be admired. The country is nevertheless also #industrial and many people are employed in the automotive industry or its supplier industries. Mexico's #road #network is approximately 377,000 kilometers long. In terms of traffic safety, it ranks in the middle of the world. #forgivingmobilityasmartandsecurefuture #tönnjesinternationalgroup #rainrfid

#Uzbekistan is actively promoting tourism and foreign investment. Last year, Samarkand's airport underwent a complete reconstruction, and there are now plans to establish direct flights to Europe (currently, passengers need to make a stopover in places like Istanbul). The economic expansion project of this country has also led to the construction of a modern district in the eastern part of Samarkand, where several luxury hotels, business centers, conference halls, and a shopping center (in the video) have been built, all designed to emulate the architectural style of the country's historic buildings. This district primarily hosts tourists, business travelers, and visiting delegations. The hotels in the background are among the few skyscrapers in the city: in Samarkand, it's possible to construct buildings with a maximum of 9-10 floors only in the newer part of the city, as the city is under the protection of #UNESCO. It has been very interesting to observe Uzbekistan's development. In fact, Uzbekistan is the second-largest economy in the region, with a continuously growing GDP since 1996 (over 79 billion dollars in 2022, an increase of approximately 10 billion from 2021). Now, the economic and commercial interests of many countries that closed their doors to #Russia after the invasion of Ukraine are shifting towards Central Asia. And Uzbekistan is on the front row for doing business. #ICTWeek #Uzbekistan #business

#Position Paper:* *Title:* Supporting the Development of the Ras Hanzir New Cargo Facility *Introduction:* As a leading construction company, ESC (Efficient Solutions in Construction) strongly supports the development of the Ras Hanzir New Cargo Facility in the Grand Harbour, Port of Valletta, Malta. This project aligns with our company's mission to deliver efficient solutions in construction and contribute to the growth and development of Malta's infrastructure. *Key Positions:* 1. *Economic Growth:* The new cargo facility will enhance the Port of Valletta's capacity, driving economic growth and increasing trade opportunities for Malta. 2. *Infrastructure Development:* The project's focus on marine works, land reclamation, and pavement works will improve the overall infrastructure of the Grand Harbour, supporting future development projects. 3. *Environmental Considerations:* ESC acknowledges the importance of environmental sustainability and supports the implementation of measures to minimize the project's ecological impact. 4. *Community Engagement:* We believe in engaging with

𝐀 𝐖𝐨𝐦𝐚𝐧-𝐥𝐞𝐝 𝐌𝐞𝐠𝐚 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐣𝐞𝐜𝐭 𝐚𝐧𝐝 100% 𝐥𝐨𝐜𝐚𝐥 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐞𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐢𝐞𝐬... 𝐓𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐢𝐬 𝐰𝐡𝐚𝐭 𝐦𝐚𝐤𝐞𝐬 𝐃𝐚𝐤𝐡𝐥𝐚 𝐀𝐭𝐥𝐚𝐧𝐭𝐢𝐜 𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐚 𝐌𝐚𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐩𝐢𝐞𝐜𝐞. As planned, the works are well progressing and Dakhla Atlantic Port project is taking shape. Expected to be delivered at the end of 2028, this game-changing project is foreseen to be the African gate for continental and international trade and an area for the achievement of economic complementarity. 1,400 highly skilled employees between managers and workers, nonstop activities covering 1,650 hectares and significant investment, all resources are mobilized to deliver a flagship megaproject to consolidate further the development model for the Southern Provinces, in line with the High Guidelines of HM the King. “𝘛𝘩𝘪𝘴 𝘪𝘴 𝘰𝘯𝘦 𝘰𝘧 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘭𝘢𝘳𝘨𝘦𝘴𝘵 𝘪𝘯𝘧𝘳𝘢𝘴𝘵𝘳𝘶𝘤𝘵𝘶𝘳𝘦 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘫𝘦𝘤𝘵𝘴 𝘪𝘯 𝘔𝘰𝘳𝘰𝘤𝘤𝘰. 𝘐𝘵 𝘪𝘴 𝘢 𝘴𝘵𝘳𝘶𝘤𝘵𝘶𝘳𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘫𝘦𝘤𝘵 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘳𝘦𝘨𝘪𝘰𝘯 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘢𝘯 𝘦𝘴𝘴𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘪𝘢𝘭 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘱𝘰𝘯𝘦𝘯𝘵 𝘰𝘧 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘥𝘦𝘷𝘦𝘭𝘰𝘱𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵 𝘱𝘭𝘢𝘯 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘴𝘰𝘶𝘵𝘩𝘦𝘳𝘯 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘷𝘪𝘯𝘤𝘦𝘴” Nisrine IOUZZI, Head of Dakhla Atlantique Port project. PS: Big thanks to Le360 Team for their big effort to follow up on this important Project. Read the full article: #Morocco #Dakhla_Atlantique_port

A report on global road quality has ranked #Morocco as a standout performer, with the country securing the 16th position in the top 20 countries with the best roads worldwide. Moroccan roads boast a mean speed score of 95 kilometers per hour, underscoring the country’s unwavering dedication to enhancing its #infrastructure, the report said. #Road Connectivity is a pivotal element in fostering inclusive development, significantly reducing commute times and increasing productivity. The United Nations recognizes its importance, incorporating an index into its Sustainable Development Goals to monitor infrastructure development globally. https://lnkd.in/eadipnDc
